text: Following <@UQYC3MYKD>, my name is Gilberto and I'm also working at Vaadin, as PO of our website (<http://vaadin.com|vaadin.com>). The website uses HubSpot CMS in a headless mode - meaning that the content from HubSpot is consumed by our server instead of by the end user. Glad to meet you all!
Hello everyone, I'm net at this!
There are a lot of peeps here! Nice
